name: IV. Data Profiling and Analysis
content:
Data Profiling

  • Missing Value Checks: Ensure completeness of sales and spend records.
  • Distribution Analysis: Assess skewness/kurtosis in spend variables.
  • Correlation Analysis: Identify potential collinearity between channels.
  • Time Series Checks: Examine seasonality and trends in sales and ad spend.

Descriptive Analysis

  • Summary Statistics: Mean, median, standard deviation for ad spends and sales.
  • Visualization:
  • Time-series plots of spends vs. sales.
  • Correlation heatmaps of advertising channels.
  • Sales distribution histograms.

Predictive Analysis

  • Adstock Regression Models: Predict sales impact from current and lagged ad spends.
  • Scenario Simulations: Forecast sales under varying budget allocations.
  • Optimization Analysis: Suggest optimal channel spend distribution to maximize sales or ROI.
